code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input  logic clk,
    input  logic [7:0] in,
    output logic [7:0] pedge
);

    logic [7:0] prev_in;

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        prev_in <= in;
    end

    always @(*) begin
        pedge = 8'b00000000; // Default output
        pedge = (prev_in == 8'b00000000) & (in == 8'b00000001) ? 8'b00000001 : pedge;
    end

endmodule
```
[DONE]
